alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 4:51PM CDT until May 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Montague County in north central Texas... Western Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alvord, or 14 miles north of Decatur, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Muenster, St. Jo, Sunset, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Nocona Hills, Prairie Point, Rosston, Bulcher, Capps Corner, Forestburg, Illinois Bend, Marysville, Sivells Bend, Mallard, Bonita and Myra. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.
